comment: This data is currently just used for fork tests, please update before running the script on mainnet!

initialRoleHolders.comment: This will assign the ActionCreator role (role 1) to the address we will use with the CreateAction script to automate deployment of new Llama instance. The role assignment is set to never expire (type(uint64).max) because this is the default. The quantity is likewise the default.
This will assign the Approver role (role 2) to the address derived from `makeAddr('randomLogicAddress')`. The role assignment never expires: expiration == type(uint64).max.
This will assign the Disapprover role (role 3). The role assignment never expires: expiration == type(uint64).max.

initialRolePermissions.comment: This gives the ActionCreator permission to call LlamaFactory.deploy which creates new Llama instances. The permissionId was derived by encoding and hashing (a) the LlamaFactory address that this script deploys, (b) LlamaFactory.deploy.selector, and (c) the address of the second Strategy specified above -- the one without a fixed voting period.
This is just used for the DeployLlama test file. It also gives the ActionCreator permission to call LlamaFactory.deploy which creates new Llama instances.
